Package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.loader

Class LoaderServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.base.AbstractComponentService<LoaderComponentType,Loader>
io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.loader.LoaderServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
LoaderService
public class LoaderServiceImpl extends AbstractComponentService<LoaderComponentType,Loader> implements LoaderService
Implementation of the LoaderService interface providing operations for checking the visibility of loader elements, as well as waiting for their appearance or removal. Extends AbstractComponentService to manage creation and retrieval of Loader instances.

This class uses LoaderComponentType to identify loader components within a UI automation framework, ensuring consistent interactions whether loaders are located via a container or a direct locator.

All methods delegate to an internal Loader instance, retrieved or created on-demand, to execute the underlying logic of showing or removing loaders within specified timeframes.

Any uncaught timeout or unexpected loading behavior typically results in a runtime exception.

Example usage within a test:

  • Instantiating this class with a SmartWebDriver instance.
  • Calling isVisible or waitToBeShown / waitToBeRemoved methods.
Author:
